Uses of Interface
org.fax4j.spi.comm.CommPortAdapter

Packages that use CommPortAdapter
org.fax4j.spi.comm Provides the COMM port communication based fax client SPI implementation. 
 

Uses of CommPortAdapter in org.fax4j.spi.comm
 

Classes in org.fax4j.spi.comm that implement CommPortAdapter
 class AbstractCommPortAdapter
          This class provides partial implementation of the basic and common adapter capabilities.
 class RXTXCommPortAdapter
          This class holds the COMM port objects.
 

Methods in org.fax4j.spi.comm that return CommPortAdapter
protected  CommPortAdapter RXTXCommPortConnectionFactory.createResourceImpl()
          Creates and returns the resource.
 

Methods in org.fax4j.spi.comm that return types with arguments of type CommPortAdapter
protected  Connection<CommPortAdapter> CommFaxClientSpi.createCommPortConnection()
          Creates and returns the COMM port connection to be used.
protected  Connection<CommPortAdapter> CommFaxClientSpi.getCommPortConnection()
          Returns the COMM port connection to be used.
